conclusion: The small car (A) is moving towards a group of blocks.
There is a clear path slightly to the right of the car that guides it past the closest yellow and blue cubes.
There is a densely packed cluster of blocks at the upper left.
Typical toy-car momentum and friction on fabric will slow down the car.
The car will slow down and stop once it reaches the densely packed cluster.
A is most likely to come to rest in the open area just in front of the orange/green/red blocks at the upper left of the scene.
